schema_version.description: the version of the cell metadata schema

grade.description: whether this cell should be graded

locked.description: whether the cell should be editable

solution.description: whether this cell contains a solution

grade_id.description: the nbgrader id of the cell, only present if one or more of grade/locked/solution is true

points.description: the number of points this cell is worth; only present if grade is true

checksum.description: a checksum of the cell contents; generally only present in the student version of an assignment

cell_type.description: the type the cell was when nbgrader assign was run; used for checking if the cell type has changed and should only be present in the student version of an assignment
